name: Candy Ken Quest: Save Baby J!
name_original: Candy Ken Quest: Save Baby J!
description:
Welcome to Candy Ken Quest! Candy Ken and Baby J are having a picnic in the forest, when Baby J decides to get them some more candy. However, she gets lost in the forest, and is calling out to Ken to help save her! The path is filled with trees, and Ken has to cut down the trees in order to clear the path to Baby J!

Candy Ken Adventure features:


MANY UNIQUE WORLDS

Travel through Lolli Land, Fruity Forest, Donut Dune, Mt. Sugar, and many more! Each world has 10 unique levels, becoming increasingly more difficult the further you progress!


MANY WAYS TO WIN REWARDS

Unlock new tools and weapons! Earn coins by playing each level, and exchange them for goodies in Ken's closet, the Rewards Center, and the Armory!



OVER 60 LEVELS!

Candy Ken has to get through 60 unique levels to find Baby J, and your job is to help him do that!
